mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ward ( guardian_id, name, age, gender, phone, relationship, diagnosis ) VALUES ( #{guardianId}, #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{relationship}, #{diagnosis} )
mapper.select: SELECT ward_id AS wardId, guardian_id AS guardianId, name, age, gender, phone, relationship, diagnosis, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, status FROM ward WHERE guardian_id = #{guardianId} AND status = 'active' ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT ward_id AS wardId, guardian_id AS guardianId, name, age, gender, phone, relationship, diagnosis, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, status FROM ward WHERE ward_id = #{wardId} AND status = 'active'
mapper.update: UPDATE ward SET diagnosis = #{diagnosis}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE ward_id = #{wardId} AND status = 'active'
